name: sperm
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a sex cell produced by a man or male animal: In human reproduction, one female egg is usually fertilized by one sperm.
[ U ] informal for
semen (= the liquid produced by the male sex organs that contains sperm)
